title: Mali's AFCON win over Tunisia stands despite referee chaos
shortDescription: Mali's victory over Tunisia will stand at the Africa Cup of Nations despite the referee causing chaos by twice blowing the final whistle too early.

title: Xhaka: I'm sorry for red | Carra: He must be moved on
shortDescription: Jamie Carragher believes Granit Xhaka has become a "liability" for Arsenal and insists they must move him on if they are to continue their progress under Mikel Arteta.

title: Rodgers: I can't guarantee Tielemans will stay
shortDescription: Leicester boss Brendan Rodgers admits Youri Tielemans could leave the club and that he has to prepare for life without the midfielder.

title: Papers: Juve ready Aubameyang offer
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Friday's national newspapers...

title: Carra: Liverpool owners wouldn't be forgiven if Salah left
shortDescription: Jamie Carragher has warned Liverpool’s owners they will never be forgiven if they allow club legend Mohamed Salah to leave the club.

title: Ten-man Arsenal hold Liverpool after Xhaka red
shortDescription: Arsenal held Liverpool to a battling goalless draw despite Granit Xhaka's early red card in the first leg of their Carabao Cup semi-final.

title: AFCON hits and misses: Aboubakar shining, Salah struggles
shortDescription: With all 24 nations having played at least one game at this year's Africa Cup of Nations, we take a look back at the best performers and who has had a week to forget...

title: Bande's winner sees Burkina Faso beat Cape Verde
shortDescription: Burkina Faso got their first points of this year's Africa Cup of Nations as Hassane Bande's winner gave them a 1-0 victory over the Cape Verde Islands on Thursday.

title: Friday at AFCON: Morocco looking to seal last-16 spot
shortDescription: Dates, kick-off times and host cities - here's the full schedule for AFCON 2021.

title: Carra: No doubt about Xhaka's 'ridiculous' red
shortDescription: Jamie Carragher says Granit Xhaka fully deserved to be sent off following his 'ridiculous' challenge on Diogo Jota in the Carabao Cup clash between Liverpool and Arsenal.

title: Use your head and back Burn at 28/1 - Jones Knows
shortDescription: Jones Knows loves nothing more than backing a centre-back to score at big odds and is tipping up Dan Burn to head home at 28/1 on Friday night.

title: Aboubakar scores twice as Cameroon beat Ethiopia to reach last 16
shortDescription: Cameroon became the first team to qualify for the last 16 of the 2021 Africa Cup of Nations after the hosts thumped Ethiopia 4-1 in Group A on Thursday.

title: Saints want to sign Broja permanently but face competition
shortDescription: Southampton are interested in signing Armando Broja on a permanent deal from Chelsea but face competition from other clubs.

title: PL predictions: Brighton to stall Palace in M23 derby
shortDescription: The Premier League returns with an exciting set of matches this weekend and our tipster Jones Knows has got you covered for insights, predictions and betting angles.

title: Everton sign El Ghazi on loan until end of season
shortDescription: Everton have signed Aston Villa winger Anwar El Ghazi on loan until the end of the season.

title: Brighton vs C Palace on Sky: Mwepu, Tomkins missing for M23 derby
shortDescription: Team news, stats and prediction ahead of Brighton vs Crystal Palace in the Premier League on Friday Night Football; kick-off 8pm.

title: Villa target Bissouma in no rush to leave Brighton
shortDescription: Yves Bissouma is in no rush to leave Brighton this month amid interest from Aston Villa - and manager Graham Potter is "confident" he will stay.

title: Buendia: Coutinho and I can play together
shortDescription: Aston Villa creator Emi Buendia has hit form in recent weeks but now faces direct competition from loan signing Philippe Coutinho... or does he?

title: Hibs' McGinn given two-game ban for 'inept' referee criticism
shortDescription: Hibernian defender Paul McGinn has been banned for two games following criticism of League Cup final referee John Beaton.

title: Newcastle make offer for Sevilla defender Carlos
shortDescription: Newcastle are continuing to push to sign Diego Carlos and are awaiting a response from Sevilla after submitting a bid for the defender.
